patch:
@@ -0,0 +1,7 @@
+#!/bin/bash
+
+# Add bun to the PATH
+export PATH="/home/y_ohi/.bun/bin:$PATH"
+
+# Execute the ccusage command
+bun x ccusage statusline --visual-burn-rate emoji
